item.title: Traefik
item.description: This section provides information about how to install and configure the ingress-based Traefik load balancer (version 2.2.8 or later for production deployments) to load balance Oracle WebCenter Content domain clusters. Follow these steps to set up Traefik as a load balancer for an Oracle WebCenter Content domain in a Kubernetes cluster: Contents Install the Traefik (ingress-based) load balancer Configure Traefik to manage ingresses Create an Ingress for the domain Verify domain application URL access Uninstall the Traefik ingress Install the Traefik (ingress-based) load balancer Use Helm to install the Traefik (ingress-based) load balancer.
